headline: Why Ethical AI in Behavioral Health Matters: Building Trust Where It Matters Most
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / January 8, 2026 / Leidos: Three Points to Remember AI in behavioral health must be ethical, not experimental. Trusted AI enhances care without replacing clinicians. Ethics must be engineered into AI from start to ...

headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Leidos (LDOS): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Leidos (LDOS) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Are Leidos Holdings’ (LDOS) Routine Insider Stock Credits Masking a Shift in Its Defense IT Positioning?
summary: In early January 2026, Leidos Holdings disclosed several insider Form 4 filings showing small automatic credits of dividend-equivalent shares to executives and directors under its Key Executive Stock Deferral Plan, reflecting routine, equity-based compensation rather than open-market trading. At the same time, investor attention toward defense and government IT companies increased after a peer won a major federal contract, drawing fresh focus to Leidos’ role in the sector. We’ll now examine...
